"A.P.241/9/23/13:00": "A report from Earth Guide... They haven't detected <%me> anywhere on Earth!"
"Emergency transmission incoming from an operator! A... telescopic image?"
"The universe, it's distorting..."
"Isn't this a black hole? They're not exactly rare, but..."
"Wait, it appeared abruptly?! They're not supposed to do that!"

"Intermediate-mass black hole, okay...
But they can't get a good view of it? Denying observation?"
"And it's expanding way too quickly! If it keeps up this pace, it'll draw the whole universe in with it!"
"This black hole's a logical anomaly! What in the universe is going on?!"
"I wonder... Could this have anything to do with <%me>'s disappearance?"

"Given the timing, it's likely not a coincidence.
Give me a minute. I might be able to figure out some explanation..."
"Sorry to keep you two waiting."
"Well, I guess you've already gotten the report regarding the black hole... Saves me the trouble of explaining."
"Past that, I've got good news and bad news."
"The good news is, we've managed to get some readings on <%me>."
"Really?! Then we've gotta hurry and rescue <%me>!"
"Calm down, Matoi. I haven't told you the bad news yet..."
"Because <%me>'s readings are coming from the center of that black hole."
"The one and only absolute system, and the place where the universe first began. And... the place where the planet known as Xion used to reside."
"And that... is where we'll find our missing Guardian."
